Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Psychiatrist says Pauline Hanna had dangerous cocktail of suicide risk factors https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-psychiatrist-says-pauline-hanna-had-dangerous-cocktail-of-suicide-risk-factors/5PUA7XTHCFCGPD3M42HYOT524U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-psychiatrist-says-pauline-hanna-had-dangerous-cocktail-of-suicide-risk-factors/5PUA7XTHCFCGPD3M42HYOT524U/ Craig KapitanThe Auckland eye surgeon is accused of having murdered wife Pauline Hanna. Fri, 06 Sep 2024 07:30:00 +0000 Eye surgeon Philip Polkinghorne, 71, stands in the High Court at Auckland dock as he pleads not guilty to murder at the outset of his trial. He is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna then staging the death to look like a suicide. Photo / Michael Craig
